Computer Science 101 - Introduction to Programming
Instructor: Dr. Jane Smith
Email: jane.smith@university.edu
Office Hours: Monday & Wednesday 2-4 PM

Course Description:
This course provides an introduction to computer programming using Python.
Students will learn fundamental programming concepts and problem-solving techniques.

Course Schedule:

Week 1 (January 8, 2025): Introduction to Programming
Week 2 (January 15, 2025): Variables and Data Types
Week 3 (January 22, 2025): Control Flow
Week 4 (January 29, 2025): Functions
Week 5 (February 5, 2025): Data Structures

Important Dates:

Assignment 1: Due January 20, 2025 at 11:59 PM (15% of grade)
Midterm Exam: February 12, 2025 at 9:00 AM (30% of grade)
Assignment 2: Due February 26, 2025 at 11:59 PM (15% of grade)
Final Project: Due March 15, 2025 at 11:59 PM (25% of grade)
Final Exam: March 20, 2025 at 2:00 PM (15% of grade)

Grading:
- Assignments: 30%
- Midterm: 30%
- Final Project: 25%
- Final Exam: 15%

Office: Computer Science Building, Room 305
Class Time: Tuesday & Thursday 10:00 AM - 11:30 AM
Location: Science Hall, Room 101
